title: I never told anyone this
content: For years I carried this quietly. Every day I wanted to speak, but fear kept me silent. I wondered if anyone would understand me, or if I would be judged for the truth I carried.
author: Anonymous

title: The letter I never sent
content: I wrote the letter late at night when the world was quiet. Each word felt heavy. In the end, the letter stayed folded in my drawer, untouched.
author: Anonymous

title: What silence taught me
content: Silence became my companion. It taught me patience, but it also taught me loneliness. Some stories are loud even when unspoken.
author: Anonymous
